sentences.sentence: But how do I get to the Elven Isle?
sentences.translation: 可是我怎么才能到精灵族的小岛呢？

sentences.sentence: Show them your skill in targeting those wretched Elven Archers!
sentences.translation: 在可恶的精灵弓箭手面前展示你的技能！

sentences.sentence: Elven workers no longer require bronze working to place improvements on forest plots.
sentences.translation: 精灵的工人们将不再需要科技制作青铜器才能在森林里建设施。
